body:
Hi Yalda



There may be other ways but you may be able to do it by creating a BSDF file. See the following for a discussion. [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/etfe-simula...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/etfe-simulation-ep-and-radiance)

Thanks



Duncan
